Title: Who's Your Daddy
Plot: As the Panthers prepare for a match against the Tigers, who are their biggest rival, Jason's new roommate tries to help him understand the potential he has for recovery.Lyla tells Tim of her regrets about what happened between them, and Matt hits an all-time low.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Hanna Loberg, Allan Graf, Robert Boothby, Brent Smiga, Charon R. Arnold, Nick Brandt, Toby Metcalf, Martha Prentiss, Dell Johnson, Margaret Hoard, Robert Parrish, Ravin Alexander, Ed Clements, Cindy Creekmore, Sab
